review: I'll give this place 3 stars. 1 for food, 2 for an amazing waiter (Gerald). Honestly, I'm giving this 3 just because I got lucky with my server. The hostes was not happy to see us. She didn't even acknowledge our presence.

HORRIBLE SERVICE. Very immature staff. Especially when you first walk in.  And waiters just seem to be inexperienced. The bartenders have fun while the bar area is a mess.   I'll pass. Back to Houlihan's for me and my family.
